data.bpmnXML:
<definitions typeLanguage="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" expressionLanguage="http://www.w3.org/1999/XPath" targetNamespace="http://www.activiti.org/test" xmlns="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:activiti="http://activiti.org/bpmn" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:omgdc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:omgdi="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI">
  <message id="injectListJSON" name="injectListJSON"/>
  <process id="Oauth_flow" name="Oauth flow" isExecutable="true">
    <startEvent id="start" name="Oauth flow"/>
    <userTask id="choose_form" name="Choose Form" activiti:assignee="${wf_currentAssignee}" activiti:formKey="poi_Choose_form"/>
    <endEvent id="end" name="end"/>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow5" sourceRef="start" targetRef="choose_form"/>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow6" sourceRef="choose_form" targetRef="exclusivegateway1"/>
    <serviceTask id="servicetask1" name="Twitter" activiti:class="plugins.facts">
      <extensionElements>
        <activiti:field name="PluginKey">
          <activiti:string>poi_TwitterFactRead_fact</activiti:string>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="parameterMap">
          <activiti:expression>${TwitterREADMap}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
      </extensionElements>
    </serviceTask>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow7" sourceRef="usertask1" targetRef="end"/>
    <exclusiveGateway id="exclusivegateway1" name="Exclusive Gateway"/>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow8" name="Twitter Oauth 1.0a" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" targetRef="servicetask1">
      <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${apiServiceName == "Twitter"}</conditionExpression>
    </sequenceFlow>
    <serviceTask id="servicetask2" name="Dropbox" activiti:class="plugins.facts">
      <extensionElements>
        <activiti:field name="PluginKey">
          <activiti:string>poi_DropboxFactRead_fact</activiti:string>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="parameterMap">
          <activiti:expression>${DropboxREADMap}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
      </extensionElements>
    </serviceTask>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow9" name="Dropbox Oauth 2.0" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" targetRef="servicetask2">
      <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${apiServiceName == "Dropbox"}</conditionExpression>
    </sequenceFlow>
    <userTask id="usertask1" name="Oauth 1a Form" activiti:assignee="${wf_currentAssignee}" activiti:formKey="poi_oauth1a_form"/>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow10" sourceRef="servicetask1" targetRef="usertask1"/>
    <userTask id="usertask2" name="Oauth 2 Form" activiti:assignee="${wf_currentAssignee}" activiti:formKey="poi_oauth2_form"/>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow11" sourceRef="servicetask2" targetRef="usertask2"/>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow12" sourceRef="usertask2" targetRef="end"/>
    <serviceTask id="servicetask3" name="GoogleDrive" activiti:class="plugins.facts">
      <extensionElements>
        <activiti:field name="PluginKey">
          <activiti:string>poi_GoogleFactRead_fact</activiti:string>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="parameterMap">
          <activiti:expression>${GoogleREADMap}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
      </extensionElements>
    </serviceTask>
    <serviceTask id="servicetask4" name="Box" activiti:class="plugins.facts">
      <extensionElements>
        <activiti:field name="PluginKey">
          <activiti:string>poi_BoxFactRead_fact</activiti:string>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="parameterMap">
          <activiti:expression>${BoxREADMap}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
      </extensionElements>
    </serviceTask>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow14" name="GoogleDrive Oauth 2.0" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" targetRef="servicetask3">
      <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${apiServiceName == "GoogleDrive"}</conditionExpression>
    </sequenceFlow>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow15" name="Box Oauth 2.0" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" targetRef="servicetask4">
      <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${apiServiceName == "Box"}</conditionExpression>
    </sequenceFlow>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow16" sourceRef="servicetask3" targetRef="usertask4"/>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow17" sourceRef="servicetask4" targetRef="usertask4"/>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow18" name="Docusign Oauth 2.0" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" targetRef="usertask3">
      <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${apiServiceName == "Docusign"}</conditionExpression>
    </sequenceFlow>
    <serviceTask id="servicetask6" name="Docusign Plugin" activiti:class="plugins.fact_components.api_Docusign_OAuth_Save">
      <extensionElements>
        <activiti:field name="username">
          <activiti:expression>${username}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="password">
          <activiti:expression>${password}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
      </extensionElements>
    </serviceTask>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow20" sourceRef="servicetask6" targetRef="end"/>
    <userTask id="usertask3" name="Docusign" activiti:assignee="${wf_currentAssignee} ">
      <extensionElements>
        <activiti:formProperty id="username" name="USERNAME" type="string" required="true"/>
        <activiti:formProperty id="password" name="PASSWORD" type="string" required="true"/>
      </extensionElements>
    </userTask>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow21" sourceRef="usertask3" targetRef="servicetask6"/>
    <userTask id="usertask4" name="Oauth 2 refresh token Form" activiti:assignee="${wf_currentAssignee}" activiti:formKey="poi_oauth2_refreshToken_form"/>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow22" sourceRef="usertask4" targetRef="end"/>
    <serviceTask id="servicetask7" name="SalesForce" activiti:class="plugins.facts">
      <extensionElements>
        <activiti:field name="PluginKey">
          <activiti:string>poi_SalesForceFactRead_fact</activiti:string>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="parameterMap">
          <activiti:expression>${SalesForceREADMap}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
      </extensionElements>
    </serviceTask>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow23" name="SalesForce Oauth 2.0" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" targetRef="servicetask7">
      <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${apiServiceName == "SalesForce"}</conditionExpression>
    </sequenceFlow>
    <serviceTask id="servicetask8" name="Hubspot" activiti:class="plugins.facts">
      <extensionElements>
        <activiti:field name="PluginKey">
          <activiti:string>poi_HubspotFactRead_fact</activiti:string>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="parameterMap">
          <activiti:expression>${HubspotREADMap}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
      </extensionElements>
    </serviceTask>
    <userTask id="usertask5" name="Oauth 2 hubspot refresh token Form" activiti:assignee="${wf_currentAssignee}" activiti:formKey="poi_oauth2_hubspot_refreshToken_form"/>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow25" name="Hubspot Oauth 2.0" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" targetRef="servicetask8">
      <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${apiServiceName == "Hubspot"}</conditionExpression>
    </sequenceFlow>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow26" sourceRef="servicetask8" targetRef="usertask5"/>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow27" sourceRef="usertask5" targetRef="end"/>
    <serviceTask id="servicetask9" name="Intuit" activiti:class="plugins.facts">
      <extensionElements>
        <activiti:field name="PluginKey">
          <activiti:string>poi_IntuitFactRead_fact</activiti:string>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="parameterMap">
          <activiti:expression>${IntuitREADMap}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
      </extensionElements>
    </serviceTask>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow29" sourceRef="servicetask7" targetRef="usertask4"/>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow30" name="Intuit Oauth 1.0a" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" targetRef="servicetask9">
      <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${apiServiceName == "Intuit"}</conditionExpression>
    </sequenceFlow>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow31" sourceRef="servicetask9" targetRef="usertask1"/>
    <serviceTask id="servicetask10" name="GoogleCalendar" activiti:class="plugins.facts">
      <extensionElements>
        <activiti:field name="PluginKey">
          <activiti:string>poi_GoogleCalendarFactRead_fact</activiti:string>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="parameterMap">
          <activiti:expression>${GoogleCalendarREADMap}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
      </extensionElements>
    </serviceTask>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow32" name="GoogleCalendar Oauth 2.0" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" targetRef="servicetask10"/>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow33" sourceRef="servicetask10" targetRef="usertask4"/>
  </process>
  <bpmndi:BPMNDiagram id="BPMNDiagram_Oauth_flow">
    <bpmndi:BPMNPlane bpmnElement="Oauth_flow" id="BPMNPlane_Oauth_flow">
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="start" id="BPMNShape_start">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="35.0" width="35.0" x="20.0" y="160.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="choose_form" id="BPMNShape_choose_form">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="60.0" width="100.0" x="225.0" y="148.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="end" id="BPMNShape_end">

      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>

forms.name: Choose API service and Oauth type

origin.name: Choose API service and Oauth type
